mission: a Christ-centred, Holy Spirit-led community committed to the building of strong relationships and planting of healthy, reproducing churches.
vision: to introduce and represent Christ through our nurturing small group-driven ministries in the community.
about-values-description: Our beliefs are the foundation of our faith, the bedrock of our church, and the scripture based teachings we desire to pass along to our congregation, community, and the next generation.
leadership-description: We believe God’s plan is that each local church be led by a team of qualified, spiritually mature men and women whose proven leadership in their home and community demonstrates their ability to lead God’s church.
